Reptilians will not appear in the game unless you add the trait to someone via console or start as one in the DWR campaign.
The only way for reptilians to exist is if you start as one or marry one from the Empire. They will NOT spawn from events.

A child of the Dragon Emperor, that was raised in the Forest.
A child of the Dragon Emperor, that was raised in the Forest.
A large room that is well insulated and heated. Serves as a resting place for Reptilians who are looking to get out of the cold.
The blood of dragons coarse through my veins. Mortal wounds mean nothing as I shed my scales with each molt. Bones grow and flesh mends, by the blessing of my ancestors I am made whole again!
